hadiths.text: Narrated AbuJurayy al-Hujaymi: I came to the Prophet (ﷺ) and said: Upon you be peace, Messenger of Allah! He said: Do not say: Upon you be peace, for "Upon you be peace" is the salutation to the dead

chapter.ara-name: باب كَرَاهِيَةِ أَنْ يَقُولَ عَلَيْكَ السَّلاَمُ
chapter.eng-name: It is disliked to say "alaikas salam"(upon you be peace)
